item.title: ContextHelper
item.description: Name Value Assembly Catel.Core Namespace Catel.Android Available on Xamarin - Android public static class ContextHelper The context helper. Fields Properties CurrentContext Gets or sets the current context. Note that the setter is made public to allow customization. It will be used primarily by Catel though.
